solution_line_template: First multiply the number of loads by the time per load to find the washing time: {num_loads} loads * {time_per_load} minutes/load = <<{num_loads}*{time_per_load}={washing_time}>>{washing_time} minutes

Then add that time to the drying time to find the total laundry time: {washing_time} minutes + {drying_time} minutes = <<{washing_time}+{drying_time}={total_laundry_time}>>{total_laundry_time} minutes
